name: What Comes Next!
description:
What Comes Next!

Platform: Print to PLay 

Genre: Card Game 

Rating: E for everyone 

Target Market: Ages 6+, casual gamers

Game Overview:  This game is used to improve your guessing skills. The goal of the game is to guess the card closest to the next one in the deck. The closer you guess to the next card the more points you will receive.

Instructions: Download the print and play instructions for more information

Game Design Team: 

Cadence Pruitt – Game Designer

Milena Perkins – Game Tester

Caitlin Vess – Game Tester Brianna Clark: Game Tester
